title: "Wow I'm doing really well against this tank top laner!"
body: Too bad he got Sunfire and Iceborn and now he does more damage than me while being unkillable.

replies.body:
Well, at least you may be able to get away from him and if he somehow gets low or caught, he cant get away. Imagine facing an Ez with {{item:3153}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3053}} in his build.

"I'm doing really well against this zed!"
{{champion:238}}: *Buys {{item:3155}}* 
"Annnnnnnd now he wins lane."
{{champion:163}} top, I am finding really craps on tanky champs through pure denial and zoning poke.

Yes it's true, champs like {{champion:133}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:163}} {{champion:127}}  and other similar ones beat top tanks in lane. The problem is you have denied your team a proper tank/engage and they're going to beat you in the long run.

i've seen a lot of {{champion:163}} top laner and they all fed

and in mid, they fed

and in support, i fed

had a game where our top laner had tal pick intent i typed: hope enemy team gets her before our top laner, otherwise we lost. the enemy team mid laner stole her and we won that game. i had to thnx that mid laner tough

Wow so far we are doing really well this game
